optionalfeature.name: Time Enchantments
entries: Whenever a creature fails a saving throw against an enchantment spell within 30 feet of you, you may use your reaction to roll on the {@table Messed Up Time Table|oreorenth}, applying the effect to them until the spell cast on them ends. You may use this feature once per Long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Fey Bargain: Pyromancer
entries: Whenever you hit with a weapon attack you deal an additional 1d4 fire damage. However, you also gain vulnerability to cold damage.

optionalfeature.name: Molten Breath
entries: You gain an additional use of your Breath weapon. Additionally, whenever you use your breath weapon you leave a trail of melting ground behind. For the next round, any creature that enters the breath’s area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 1d10 fire damage.

feature: Dragonborn whose breath deals fire damage

optionalfeature.name: Combustion Breath
entries: You gain an additional use of your breath weapon. Additionally whenever a creature fails their saving throw against your breath weapon they combust in flame. At the start of each of its turns the target takes 1d10 fire damage. The target must then make a Dexterity saving throw, on a successful save, the effect ends. If the target or a creature within 5 feet of it uses an action to put out the flames, or if some other effect douses the flames (such as the target being submerged in water), the Effect ends.

optionalfeature.name: Corrosive Breath
entries: You gain an additional use of your breath weapon. Additionally, the armor class of a creature decreases by 1 whenever they fail their saving throw against your breath. Their armor class returns to normal after a Short Rest.

feature: Dragonborn whose breath deals acid damage

optionalfeature.name: I was never here
entries: Whenever you leave after meeting a person you may make a deception check against their passive insight. On a success they forget your name and what you look like. You may use this ability once per short rest, if you fail you don't expend a use.

optionalfeature.name: Breath of Steam and Storm
entries: Once per turn when you deal fire or lightning damage to a creature, you may also deal additional damage of the other type equal to your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Power from the Shield
entries: At the start of your turn you gain temporary hit points equal to your AC-10-your Dexterity modifier. You may get these temporary hit points a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier every long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Tortoise
entries: Whenever you retreat into your shell you may still use your action to do one of the following things: Make a single unarmed strike, move up to your walking speed, make a skill check. However, your swimming speed is reduced by 10 feet even outside your shell.

optionalfeature.name: Gelatinous Spirit
entries: A spectral gelatinous cube forms around you. People may only move through your space if you allow them to. As a bonus action you may increase the size of the cube to 10 by 10 feet for the next minute. You may use this bonus action a number of times equal to your constitution modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Skin Shedding
entries: After you finish a short rest you may shed your skin. For the next 24 hours the following effects apply to you: You gain vulnerability to fire damage. You may roll one hit die and add your consitution modifier and increase your hp maximum by this amount. You are considered large for the purposes of grappling, carrying, pushing and lifting.

optionalfeature.name: Freezing Breath
entries: You gain an additional use of your breath weapon. Additionally, whenever you use your breath weapon it leaves a trail of icy ground. For the next minute, any creature that enters the breath’s area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there needs to make a dexterity save against your breath DC. On a failure they fall prone.

feature: Dragonborn whose breath deals cold damage

optionalfeature.name: Kobold Craftiness
entries: Over the course of a short rest you may gather materials to craft an item worth no more 2 gold pieces. You craft an item that can emulate the effects of a tier 1 and 2 Orenth trait related to the area you're resting in. Only you can use the item and it breaks after 24 hours or when you make a new one. You can also create an attachment to something you already have on you, such as a weapon or armor.
You can only pick an Orenth trait that can be used once per long rest, once per long rest. Whenever you pick a trait that can be used multiple times every long rest you may use it once.

optionalfeature.name: Unstable Creations
entries: Whenever you create an item with your Kobold Craftiness trait you may choose a thematically appropriate cantrip and first level spell. You may cast these spells using your Wisdom (chromatic), Charisma (Metallic) or Intelligence (Gem) as its spellcasting ability, depending on your colour. Once you cast the first level spell your item is destroyed.

optionalfeature.name: Magical and Unstable Weapon
entries: Whenever you make a weapon (attachment) with this trait it becomes a +1 magical weapon, unless it is a magic weapon that already has a bonus to those rolls. Whenever you roll a natural 1 on an attack roll with it roll a d6. If you roll a value higher than your proficiency bonus the weapon (attachment) immediately breaks.

optionalfeature.name: Home Sweet Home
entries: Whenever you craft an item in an area with the same Orenth type as your kobold heritage you may emulate a tier 2 and a tier 3 trait instead.

optionalfeature.name: Alseid
entries: You gain resistance against radiant damage. Additionally you learn the Goodberry spell and you may cast it once per long rest using your Charisma as your spellcasting ability. When you do so, the goodberries take the shape of a fruit of your choice.

optionalfeature.name: Plant Sprint
entries: While moving across plant covered terrain, such as grasslands, climbing up a tree or navigating through a thick jungle, your speed increases by 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Brass Enemies
entries: You have advantage on saving throws inposed by brass dragons, dragonborn and kobolds. Additionally you have advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling unconscious and if you fall unconscious after failing a saving throw you may repeat the saving throw at the end of each of your turns ending the effect on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Homegrown Weapons
entries: Your body can grow its own weapons. Over the course of a long rest you may grow a wooden club, greatclub, quarterstaff or maul. Once you've grown your weapon, you may also pick one tier 2 orenth trait with the Weapon Mastery subtype and apply it to the weapon until you grow a new one.

optionalfeature.name: Phototropism
entries: Whenever you start your turn in sunlight you become enlarged according to the Enlarge/Reduce spell. The effect ends as soon as you start your turn outside of sunlight.

optionalfeature.name: Poisonous Spines
entries: Once per turn when you hit a creature with your cactus spike you may deal an additional 1d4 poison damage to them.

optionalfeature.name: Shock Resistance
entries: You gain advantage on saving throws made to avoid the paralyzed and stunned condition

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Flames
entries: Whenever you cast your produce flame cantrip and you hurl your flame at a creature, you also deal 1d4 fire damage to any creature within 5 feet of them on a hit.

optionalfeature.name: Shocking Leaps
entries: You can move up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attaacks from the target of cantrip, as a part of casting this cantrip.

optionalfeature.name: Burst of Vines
entries: The range of your Thorn Whip cantrip increases to 60 feet. Additionally, you may create a number of whips equal to the number of damage dice you could deal, making an attack roll for each of them seperatly. Each of these whips deals 1d6 piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Acid Wave
entries: Whenever you cast your Acid Splash cantrip you create a 10 foot radius sphere instead.

optionalfeature.name: Powerful Gusts
entries: You learn the Gust cantrip and you use Wisdom as your spellcasting ability. Whenever you cast this cantrip you may target a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus.

optionalfeature.name: Explosive Bursts
entries: You learn the Sorcerous Burst cantrip. Whenever you cast this spell it deals 1d6+2 damage instead. If you roll an 6 on a d6 for this spell, you can roll another 1d6+2, and add it to the damage. When you cast this spell, the maximum number of these d6s you can add to the spell's damage equals your spellcasting ability modifier.

feature: Elemental Chaos or Mark of Tiamat Orenth

optionalfeature.name: Spore Spray
entries: Whenever you cast your Poison Spray cantrip, you may choose to deal psychic damage instead.

optionalfeature.name: Lightning Genasi
entries: You may cast the Witch Bolt spell with this trait. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for the spell. You can't cast it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast either of those spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. You are also considered a lightning genasi for trait prerequisites. You may pick this trait without it taking up an Orenth trait, but then you loose your ability to cast Feather Fall once per long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Blade Moat
entries: Whenever a creature makes an attack roll against an ally within 5 feet of you while you are concentrating on blade ward, you may use your reaction to subtract 1d4 from the attack roll.
